topic.title: Problems
topic.body:
I had problems to install zeronet with virtualenv and to get my zeroId via bitmessage...
Are there better places to report problems?
By the way nice work so far

topic.title: Editor
topic.body: Is there a ZeroNetEditor with HTML,CSS, Javascript Snippets and SQL dumps?

topic.title: Anarchy is on the rise
topic.body:
Come to the anarchy world where trust is the only currency.
1LvA9gq9HQWJS1uB8CahzgNm3UJxFi9snt

1_1JgHfDK4eojCkVZHKey9hiMAcAc9mxMUK2.body:
> [parigo](#comment_1_1G93135DKegpzoqyADP2MznzTwSUBLQKnQ): May be a bridge from ZeroNet to files only cms like GRAV https://getgrav.org/ and FLARUM http://flarum.org/ can do the job?

Are they really file based? Checkout http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:2_1CHcEy3SYsQvrW9uskKTZxUWj97BmZmvfa/Is+there+any+CMS+that+ZeroMe+does+support

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Why is the user data often so much higher then the content? Is there not a cleanup after a timestamp?
